# Tender Announcement: Infrared Imaging System for Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food

### Solicitation Number: WS4469584113
### Solicitation Title: Infrared Imaging System Supply, Delivery and Installation

### Date of Publication: 2024-05-09

### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP) – Competitive Open Bidding

### Closing Date: 2024-06-05 14:00 EDT

### Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) Document
This notice is released by the Public Works and Government Services (PWGSC) country-wide on behalf of the Department of Agriculture and Agri-Food (AAFC).

### System Requirements
Agriculture and Agri-Food Canada requires the supply, delivery, and installation of one infrared imaging system. The system details are outlined in the tender document available through Ariba Discovery. Please disregard the initial closing time indicated in the Ariba Discovery posting response. 

### Submission Requirements
All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted by the closing date of 2024-06-05 at 14:00 EDT. Please note that late submissions received after 14:00 EDT will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.

### Background
This procurement is conducted under the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), and the Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, among others.

### Notice and Documents
This tender notice and the documents related to this tender can be found at: https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/19648620?extsite=MTk2NDg2MjBfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==.
